...fabrics strap-line...
CREPE

Our flattering viscose crepe fabric has been carefully selected because of its stretch, drape and softness. The inherent stretch of the twisted yarns gives superior comfort to the wearer and the mix with polyester and elastane adds further strength, stretch recovery and easy care properties.

SILK

Our gorgeous Chinese silk offers the height in luxury and elegance. Known for its high quality Silk’s natural properties make it comfortable to wear at any time of the year whilst its aesthetic properties make it drape and handle beautifully.

LEATHER

We have selected the highest quality Italian lambskin leather for our fabric belts. It is characterized by its extreme softness and flexibility and comes in a wide colour palette to complement our core fabric range.

Faux LEATHER

Our stretch faux leather provides a more maintainable and affordable option to real leather. Soft and supple it adds a touch of sass to any outfit whether as trim or as a whole garment.
